For sale here is a card depicting "Sleepy" Bill Burns of Black Sox scandal fame.

The price is $SOLD, net to me, postpaid via fortified PWE in the continental U.S.  

[url]seablaster@yahoo.com[/url]

[url]www.collectorfocus.com/collection/seablaster[/url]

The appropriate description of this card should be

Well Centered with Sharp Corners for the Grade
